text: Hatun Rit'i (Quechua hatun big, rit'i snow, "big snow (mountain)", Hispanicized spelling Jatunrite) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru, about high. It lies in the Huancavelica Region, Angaraes Province, Lircay District. ==References== Category:Mountains of Huancavelica Region Category:Mountains of Peru
title: Hatun Rit'i
